custom-sql.sql: Select eu.* from user_ u, esfuser eu where u.lastName like ? and u.firstName like ? and u.userId in (Select esfUserId from esfcard c, esfentitystate e where esforganizationId in (select organizationId from organization_ o where o.treePath LIKE ?) and e.esfStateId = ? and c.esfcardId = e.classPK and e.endDate is null and e.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and c.code_ LIKE ?) and u.userId = eu.esfUserId order by u.lastName, u.firstName, c.code_)

select distinct test.* from (SELECT eu.* FROM user_ u,esfuser eu,esfcard c,esfentitystate e,organization_ o WHERE u.userId = eu.esfUserId AND c.esfuserid=eu.esfUserId AND c.esfcardId = e.classPK AND e.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' AND c.esforganizationId=o.organizationId AND e.esfStateId = 1 AND u.lastName LIKE ? AND u.firstName LIKE ? AND o.treePath LIKE ? AND c.code_ LIKE ? order by u.lastName, u.firstName, c.code_) test

Select eu.* from user_ u, esfuser eu where u.lastName like ? and u.firstName like ? and eu.fiscalCode like ? and u.userId in (Select esfUserId from esfcard c, esfentitystate e where esforganizationId in (select organizationId from organization_ o where o.treePath LIKE ?) and e.esfStateId = ? and c.esfcardId = e.classPK and e.endDate is null and e.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' ) and u.userId = eu.esfUserId order by u.lastname, u.firstname, eu.fiscalCode

Select eu.* from esfuser eu, user_ u,esfcard c, esfentitystate e, esfentitystate e1, esfuseresfuserrole uur where c.esforganizationId in (select organizationId from organization_ o where o.treePath LIKE ?) and e.esfStateId = ? and e.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and c.esfcardId = e.classPK and e.endDate is null and e1.esfStateId = ? and e1.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFUser' and c.esfUserId = e1.classPK and e1.endDate is null and c.esfUserId= uur.esfUserId and uur.esfUserRoleId= ? and eu.esfUserId= c.esfUserId and u.userId = eu.esfUserId order by u.lastname, u.firstname, eu.fiscalCode

Select c.* from fitav.esfentitystate e, fitav.esfcard c, fitav.organization_ o where c.esfcardid = e.classPk and c.esforganizationid=o.organizationid and e.classname = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.endDate is null and e.esfstateid= 1 and o.treePath like ?
SELECT c.* FROM fitav.esfcard c , fitav.esfentitystate e where c.esfCardId = e.classPK and e.endDate is null and e.esfStateId = ? and c.esfOrganizationId = ?

Select c.* from fitav.esfentitystate e, fitav.esfcard c, fitav.organization_ o where c.esfcardid = e.classPk and c.esforganizationid=o.organizationid and e.classname = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.endDate is null and e.esfstateid = 1 and c.esfuserid = 0 and o.treePath like ?

Select c.* from fitav.esfentitystate e, fitav.esfcard c where c.esfcardid = e.classPk
and e.classname = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.endDate is null and e.esfstateid = 1 and c.esfuserid = 0 and c.esfOrganizationId = 0

SELECT * FROM fitav.esfcard where fitav.esfcard.esfCardId in( SELECT e.classPK FROM fitav.esfentitystate e where e.className = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and e.esfStateId = 1 and e.endDate is null and e.classPK in( select c.esfCardId FROM fitav.esfcard c where c.esfUserId = ? ) )

Select g.* from fitav.esfgunuser g, fitav.user_ u where u.userId = g.esfUserId
and u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ? and g.esfGunId = ? and g.type_ = 1

Select g.*
from fitav.esfgunuser g, fitav.user_ u where u.userId = g.esfUserId
and u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ? and g.type_ = 1

Select g.*
from fitav.esfgunuser g, fitav.user_ u, fitav.esfcane c where u.userId = g.esfUserId
and u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ? and c.esfGunKindId = ? and c.esfCaneId = g.esfGunId and g.type_ = 2

Select g.*
from fitav.esfgunuser g, fitav.user_ u, fitav.esfcane c where u.userId = g.esfUserId
and u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ? and c.esfCaneId = g.esfGunId and g.type_ = 2

select eu.*
from fitav.esfuser eu , fitav.user_ u
where eu.esfUserId = u.userId and u.firstName like ? and u.lastName like ?
and eu.esfUserId in( select ur.esfUserId from fitav.esfuseresfuserrole ur where (ur.esfUserRoleId = ? and ur.esfOrganizationId = ? and ur.endDate is null) )

Select u.*
FROM fitav.esfuser u, fitav.user_ us
where u.esfUserId = us.userId and upper(us.firstName) like upper(?) and upper(us.lastName) like upper(?) and upper(u.fiscalCode) like upper(?) and u.esfUserId in( Select ur.esfUserId FROM fitav.esfuseresfuserrole ur where ( ur.endDate is null and ur.esfOrganizationId = ? and ur.esfUserRoleId in ( select ru.esfUserRoleId FROM fitav.esfuserrole ru where ( ru.isBDO = 0 ) ) ) ) and u.esfUserId not in ( Select nd.esfUserId FROM fitav.esfnationaldelegation nd where ( nd.esfMatchId = ? ) )
SELECT ur.* FROM fitav.esfuseresfuserrole ur where ur.esfUserId = ? and ur.endDate is null and ur.esfUserRoleId in( SELECT ru.esfUserRoleId FROM fitav.esfuserrole ru where ru.isBDO = 0 )

Select u.*
FROM fitav.esfuser u, fitav.user_ us
where u.esfUserId = us.userId and upper(us.firstName) like upper(?) and upper(us.lastName) like upper(?) and upper(u.fiscalCode) like upper(?) and u.esfUserId in( Select ur.esfUserId FROM fitav.esfuseresfuserrole ur where ( ur.endDate is null and ur.esfUserRoleId in ( select ru.esfUserRoleId FROM fitav.esfuserrole ru where ( ru.isBDO = 0 ) ) ) ) and u.esfUserId not in ( Select p.esfUserId FROM fitav.esfpartecipant p where ( p.esfMatchId = ? ) )

SELECT m.* FROM fitav.esfmatch m
where ( and m.isNational = 1 and m.esfMatchId in (
SELECT nd.esfMatchId FROM fitav.esfnationaldelegation nd where ( nd.esfUserId = ? and nd.esfPartecipantTypeId = 1
) ) )

SELECT c.* FROM fitav.esfentitystate e,fitav.esfcard c,fitav.esfuser u WHERE c.esfcardid = e.classPk AND c.esfuserid = u.esfuserid AND e.classname = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' aND endDate is null and esfStateId= ? and u.esfuserid= ?

SELECT c.* FROM fitav.esfentitystate e,fitav.esfcard c WHERE c.esfcardid = e.classPk AND e.classname = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and c.esfuserid= ? and esfStateId= 1 AND (endDate is null or endDate in(SELECT max(endDate) FROM fitav.esfentitystate e,fitav.esfcard c WHERE c.esfcardid = e.classPk AND e.classname = 'it.ethica.esf.model.ESFCard' and esfStateId= 1 AND endDate is not null and c.esfuserid= ?))
